name: Mega Pinball
summary: Mega Pinball is a budget label, three table, single-player, mouse controlled game. The three tables are shown on a rotating clothes-rack affair: Dragon Slayer, Crystal Tower and Monsters Rhapsody. The mouse is used to navigate the game's menus while the keyboard is the default controller while playing the game. While playing the game send messages to the player, These scroll right/left across the bottom of the screen and left right across the top of the screen, in both cases the text is pushed across the screen by a tractor. There is no in-game music but there are wacky sound effects. The action keys can be redefined.
